title: Cardiovascular Care Visual
description:
“Try before you buy" - Download the FREE App, which includes sample content. In-App purchase required to unlock all content.

Based on 3rd ed. Incredibly Easy! Series® Contains algorithms & flowcharts. 100+ colored photographs, images, & charts. Visual mnemonics that help nurses understand & remember difficult concepts. Perfect for visual learners — numerous images that demonstrate skills and interventions

Get the vital basics of cardiovascular care, with the expert direction & clear-cut images of the freshly updated Cardiovascular Care Made Incredibly Visual! ™, 3rd Ed.

Let this colorful, down-to-earth text guide you smoothly through essential skills, concepts, and equipment how-to’s, including physical assessments,diagnostic tests, cardiac monitoring, and handling emergencies and complications. Get ready for success in both the classroom & with patient care; the clear explanations,Incredibly Visual ™ humor & numerous illustrations make this the enjoyable way to learn positive, effective cardiac care.

Master the fundamental concepts, skills,processes of cardiac care … NEW & updated guidance on the Advanced Cardiac Life Support(ACLS) algorithms,with step-by-step direction on handling emergency situations

NEW end-of-chapter selected readings that support evidence-based learning Hundreds of colorful images that bring complex cardiovascular care concepts to life—drawings, charts, photos, diagrams explaining & reinforcing key cardiovascular concepts in easy-to-follow ways

Ideal reference & review for nursing students, new nurses,other healthcare practitioners —detailed visuals and clear, concise explanations to help you master cardiovascular anatomy, physiology effective treatments & interventions Perfect for visual learners—numerous images that demonstrate skills & interventions in easy-to-follow ways,including:
-Essential cardiovascular anatomy & physiology
-Physical assessment techniques
-Diagnostic tests
-Common disorders
-ECG interpretation,including rhythm strip analysis, the 8-step method,arrhythmias
-Cardiac monitoring methods, including handling monitor problems
-Hemodynamic monitoring
-Handling complications
-Treatments & interventions
-Emergency procedures
-Excellent teaching aid—visual, step-by-step instruction applied to real-life patient care scenarios,backed by expert clinical tips
-Perfect supplement to medical-surgical texts on cardiovascular care,clarifying complex concepts

Chapter features:
-Just the facts—quick summary of chapter content
-Vision Quest—End-of-Chapter games that help you match words, concepts, photos to reinforce key learning points
-“Nurse Joy and Jake” —Practical advice and expert insights offered throughout
-Memory jogger -simple techniques for remembering vital information 

Content licensed from printed edition ISBN 10: 149636337X, ISBN 13: 9781496363374
